A4.text: Arthur Joseph Rooney Sr. was the founding owner of the Pittsburgh Steelers.

A5.text: Rooney's affiliation with the National Football League (NFL) began in 1933 when he paid a $2,500 franchise fee to found a club based in the city of Pittsburgh.
